297  1o0h   5.92   6826.298361
298  1u1b   7.80  12110.406188

Summary of the scoring power: ===================================
The regression equation: logKa = 0.00 + 3.53 * Score
Number of favorable sample (N) = 298
Pearson correlation coefficient (R) = 0.608
Standard deviation in fitting (SD) = 1.73
=================================================================

Template command for running the bootstrap in R program==========

rm(list=ls());
require(boot);
data_all<-read.table("rmsd_rmc15_processed_score",header=TRUE);
aa<-c(1:nrow(data_all));

mycore<-function(x,indices)
{
data_1<-matrix(NA,298,2);
for(i in 1:298);
    {
        data_1[i,1]=data_all[x[indices][i],2];
        data_1[i,2]=data_all[x[indices][i],3];
    }
        data_2<-data.frame(data_1);
        names(data_2)<-c("a","b");
        cor(data_2$a,data_2$b);
};

data.boot<-boot(aa,mycore,R=10000,stype="i",sim="ordinary");
sink("rmsd_rmc15-ci.results");
a<-boot.ci(data.boot,conf=0.9,type=c("bca"));
print(a);
sink();

=================================================================
